title: Roe v. Wade
description: The Supreme Court invents a 'right to privacy' that encompasses the right to kill a child. This unconstitutional decree stripped personhood from the unborn.

title: Heartbeat Bill (HB 481)
description: Georgia passes the LIFE Act, banning abortion after a heartbeat is detected (approx 6 weeks). While a step forward, it still allows abortion before 6 weeks and contains exceptions.

title: Dobbs v. Jackson
description: Roe v. Wade is overturned. The authority to protect life is returned to the states. The excuse of 'federal tyranny' is removed.

title: HB 441 Introduced
description: The Georgia Equal Protection Act is introduced. It provides equal protection for the preborn from the moment of fertilization.
